          <title>
            <string language="en">Calcium carbonate dissociation</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kalziumkarbonatauflösung</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Dissociation de carbonate de calcium</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Dissociation do carbonato de cálcio</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Dissociazione del carbonato di calcio</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Διαχωρισμός ανθρακικού άλατος ασβεστίου</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Disociación del carbonato de calcio</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows that calcium carbonate dissociates to calcium oxide and carbon dioxide.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">carbon dioxide</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">calcium oxide</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">compounds</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">dissociation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">filtration</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt, daß Kalziumkarbonat zum 
Kalziumoxid und zum Kohlendioxyd sich trennt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration prouve que le carbonate de 
calcium dissocie à l'oxyde de calcium et à l'anhydride carbonique.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra que o carbonato de 
cálcio dissociates ao óxido de cálcio e ao dióxido de carbono.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione indica che il carbonato di 
calcio dissocia all'ossido di calcio ed all'anidride carbonica.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση δείχνει ότι το ανθρακικό άλας 
ασβεστίου χωρίζει στο οξείδιο ασβεστίου και το διοξείδιο του 
άνθρακα.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra que el carbonato de 
calcio disocia al óxido de calcio y al bióxido de carbono.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kohlendioxyd</string>
          </keyword>
